blogPost.excerpt: Spend less time worrying about QA, PR reviews and API pipelines with Inso, the Insomnia CLI that integrates directly with your CI/CD pipeline with ease.
blogPost.body: Spend less time worrying about QA, PR reviews and API pipelines with Inso, the Insomnia CLI that integrates directly with your CI/CD pipeline with ease.
blogPost.title: Insomnia CLI - Speed up API CI/CD pipeline development
blogPost.author: Mayur Sojitra

localize.description: 使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接与您的CI/CD流水线轻松集成，减少对QA、PR审查和API流水线的担忧。
使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接與您的CI/CD流水線輕鬆集成，減少對QA、PR審查和API流水線的擔憂。

previous.excerpt: We're here to help you experience the joy of second home ownership. With Pacaso, you own a second home for 1/8 of the cost, while avoiding the hassles of traditional ownership. We'll help you find the perfect fit. You decide how many shares you'd like to own.
previous.title: Pacaso - The modern way to buy and own a second home

localize.description: 我们在这里帮助您体验二手房所有权的乐趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花费1/8的成本就能拥有一套二手房，同时避免了传统置业的麻烦。我们会帮您找到最合适的房子。您决定您想拥有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 现代人购买和拥有第二套住房的方式。

localize.description: 我們在這裏幫助您體驗二手房所有權的樂趣。有了Pacaso，您只需花費1/8的成本就能擁有一套二手房，同時避免了傳統置業的麻煩。我們會幫您找到最合適的房子。您決定您想擁有多少股份。
localize.tagline: 現代人購買和擁有第二套住房的方式。

next.excerpt: Halbestunde introduces a new way of learning the piano. The AI app is a co-trainer, ready to give you customized feedback at any time. Therefore, we use a specifically developed algorithm that allows the app to recognize and play every piece of music you want.
next.title: Halbestunde - Scan your piece of music and start practicing right away

localize.description: Halbestunde引入了一种新的学琴方式。这款人工智能应用是一个辅助教练，随时可以给你定制化的反馈。因此，我们使用了专门开发的算法，让应用能够识别并弹奏你想要的每一首音乐。
localize.tagline: 扫描您的音乐作品，并立即开始练习。

localize.description: Halbestunde引入了一種新的學琴方式。這款人工智能應用是一個輔助教練，隨時可以給你定製化的反饋。因此，我們使用了專門開發的算法，讓應用能夠識別並彈奏你想要的每一首音樂。
localize.tagline: 掃描您的音樂作品，並立即開始練習。
